directions: Mix onion, salmon, crackers, egg, butter, lemon juice, and black pepper together in a bowl; form into 4 patties.
Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat; fry patties in the hot oil until crispy and golden brown, about 5 minutes per side.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can salmon, drained and flaked
8 crackers, crushed, or more to taste
title: Salmon Cakes for One
